name: Deep Indigo
description:
A little girl losses her rabbit plushes and she is trying to find them in her house, but she has some visions caused by her schizophrenia and can't differentiate reality from her mind's dark illusions. Help her to find their plushes and avoid the mysterious enemies.

Gameplay: point and press left click to move your character, press right click to change between stealth mode and normal mode.
